cssioReadData 
 int cssioReadData(WFDISC30 *wfdisc,
                   const char *working_dir,
                   double start_time,
                   double end_time,
                   int pts_wanted,
                   int *npts,
                   double *tbeg,
                   double *tdel,
                   float **pdata)
Read waveform data. Use the input wfdisc to read and uncompress waveform data. Values between start_time and end_time are returned. If pts_wanted is > 0, then the data will be decimated if necessary to insure that no more than pts_wanted data values are returned. Set pts_wanted to 0 to return all data values.

Parameters:
wfdisc - The input wfdisc structure.
working_dir - The working directory. The wfdisc dir is relative to this.
start_time - The lower limit of the data times.
end_time - The upper limit of the data times.
pts_wanted - The maximum number of data values wanted. Set to 0 to return all values.
npts - The actual number of values returned (output).
tbeg - The actual start time of the data values returned (output).
tdel - The time increment of the data values returned (output).
pdata - The data values returned. (The array is allocated.)
